articles.title: AirAsia X posts record RM24.6bil net loss in Apr-June quarter - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd posted a massive RM24.6bil net loss in the three-month ended June 30, the long haul budget airline's nine straight quarterly losses.
